backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with user profile types, mood/gender/intent enums, and text conversion helpers, wiring in authorization and migration logic.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration that adds an optional avatar field to stored user profiles, converting old state into the new format.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping avatar‑related features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables and dark‑mode tokens defining global color, radius, and layout styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root mount div and script loader for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up global providers and TanStack Router routes for all main pages including profile and feed.
frontend/src/components/app/AppFooter.ts: Empty placeholder file for a now‑removed footer component.
frontend/src/components/app/AppHeader.ts: Renders the top app bar with theme toggle, journal button, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/app/AppLayout.ts: Defines the global app layout with header, bottom navigation, journal overlay, and main content outlet.
frontend/src/components/app/BottomNav.ts: Implements the fixed bottom navigation bar with icon‑first buttons and unread notification badges.
frontend/src/components/app/FloatingJour: Floating action button that appears when visible and navigates to the compose page.
frontend/src/components/app/ThemeToggleB: Button that toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wraps children with auth logic, showing a loader or login panel if identity is missing.
Login screen with branding, randomized copy, Internet Identity login, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleEne: Card displaying a generated summary of circle energy based on status posts.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleMem: Lists circle members with profile info and allows removing other members.
frontend/src/components/circle/JoinByCod: Form to submit a share code to join a circle with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/circle/PendingRe: Shows incoming join requests with profile info and actions to accept or decline.
frontend/src/components/circle/SafePeopl: Interface to manage up to two safe people, with profile lookup and toggle handling.
frontend/src/components/circle/ShareCode: UI card to view, copy, edit, and save a user’s share code with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/common/IconActio: Reusable button with icon, tooltip, and optional children using shadcn UI components.
frontend/src/components/common/Progressi: Collapsible section with a trigger button for revealing additional content.
frontend/src/components/feed/MoodCheckIn: Reminder card prompting the user to complete a mood check-in, with dismiss and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/feed/SilentSigna: Displays a silent signal with author info, mood styling, timestamp, and ownership indicator.
UI for sending predefined silent signals to safe people, handling validation and async submission.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalD: Popover date picker for selecting a journal date with future dates disabled.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Panel for listing, creating, and deleting journal entries with rules enforcing day-based editability.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalO: Right-side sheet displaying journal UI with date selection, rules, and entries panel.
frontend/src/components/profile/MicroAct: Displays micro‑action suggestions based on mood history, falling back to guidance when data is insufficient.
frontend/src/components/profile/MoodAnal: Analyzes mood trends over a selected timeframe and visualizes distribution, concerns, and related micro‑actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Provides avatar selection and upload with validation, preview handling, and callbacks for updating the user’s avatar.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Gates profile‑dependent content, handling loading, errors, and showing onboarding if no profile exists.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Guides new users through multi‑step profile creation and saves the completed profile.
frontend/src/components/sound/SoundEffec: Monitors notifications, feed, join requests, and circle member changes to play appropriate sound effects on new activity.
frontend/src/components/status/ContextTa: UI component for selecting predefined tags and adding custom context tags with validation.
frontend/src/components/status/MoodPicke: Searchable mood selector that groups moods by category and lets users pick one.
frontend/src/components/status/PostStatu: Dialog prompting users to write a private note and showing optional micro‑action suggestions.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusCar: Displays a user’s status post with mood styling, author info, timestamp, and optional audience count.
frontend/src/constants/contextTags.ts: Defines predefined context tags and limits for custom tag usage.
frontend/src/constants/foundationCopy.ts: Provides core promise and boundary text for the app.
frontend/src/constants/loginCopy.ts: Contains rotating login screen copy and a helper to select random phrases.
frontend/src/constants/moods.ts: Defines all mood options with labels, emojis, and categories.
frontend/src/constants/sounds.ts: Lists sound cue asset paths and their type mapping.
frontend/src/constants/systemAvatars.ts: Defines system avatar metadata and a helper to get an avatar path by id.
frontend/src/contexts/FloatingJournalVis: React context managing visibility of the floating journal UI.
frontend/src/contexts/JournalOverlayCont: React context controlling the journal overlay state and open/close behavior.
frontend/src/contexts/SoundContext.tsx: Provides a sound context that manages audio unlocking, preferences, and playback for notification-related cues.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor to add error handling and a refetchable query state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook managing auth client creation, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useJournal.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting journal entries through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodHistory.ts: Builds a user's recent mood history from feed items filtered by timeframe and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines various profile, avatar, and data queries and mutations using the backend actor and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSound.ts: Exposes the sound context hook as a simple wrapper.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base file defining light/dark theme variables, mood colors, and safe‑area utility rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point bootstrapping React with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CirclePage.tsx: Renders the Circle page with tabs for members, requests, joining, and safe people, pulling requests and feed data to show counts and energy posts.
frontend/src/pages/ComposeStatusPage.tsx: Provides a form to compose and share a mood status with selected audience, handling mood selection, context tags, and post-submission prompts.
frontend/src/pages/DailyCheckInPage.tsx: Implements the daily check‑in flow requiring a mood and audience, gated by a reminder guard and ending with an optional journal prompt.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the feed of status updates and silent signals, with refresh, mood reminder, and empty‑state guidance.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows unread and read notifications with timestamps, allowing users to mark items as read and navigate to related statuses.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Lets users view and edit their profile, including personal info, preferences, and avatar management.
frontend/src/pages/StatusDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single status post with loading and error handling, allowing navigation back to the feed.
frontend/src/utils/age.ts: Utilities for calculating age, formatting dates, and parsing date strings using bigint timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/circleEnergy.ts: Provides mood filtering, sentiment categorization, vibe analysis, and seeded phrase generation for Circle Energy summaries.
frontend/src/utils/contextTags.ts: Validates and normalizes custom context tags, checking for emptiness, length, and duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCheckInEntry.ts: Manages a sessionStorage guard flag for entering daily check‑in mode once per session.
frontend/src/utils/microActions.ts: Generates micro‑action suggestions based on recent mood patterns and context tags using a conservative rule engine.
frontend/src/utils/moodAnalysis.ts: Analyzes mood patterns to compute distributions, trends, concern levels, and user guidance with a disclaimer.
frontend/src/utils/moodColors.ts: Maps mood categories to Tailwind color and gradient class sets for consistent UI styling.
frontend/src/utils/moodReminder.ts: Manages a once‑per‑day mood reminder using localStorage to track dismissal by date.
frontend/src/utils/profileAvatar.ts: Builds avatar image sources from system or uploaded data and validates avatar uploads.
frontend/src/utils/shareCode.ts: Generates a 6‑character alphanumeric onboarding share code without ambiguous characters.
frontend/src/utils/soundPreferences.ts: Stores and retrieves the user's sound‑enabled preference using localStorage with safe defaults.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utilities for converting between bigint nanosecond timestamps and JS Dates, checking day boundaries, and formatting dates for display or input.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash-based routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, radius, shadows, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current feature set, scope direction, and versions for app routing, authentication, onboarding, actors, RBAC, and query hooks.
